Service Details: - Provides designated driving service- Team of two drivers respond to calls to enable the client's vehicle to be safely driven home for them
Hours: Mon and Tue: by appointment onlyWed, Thu, Sun: 8:00pm - 3:00amFri, Sat: 8:00pm - 4:00am
Cost: Service ; - $15.00 basic charge for 5km or under- Price increases at 10km, 15km, 20km- Call for quotation for trips of over 20km- After the first 5 minutes, waiting time is charged at $1.00/minute- Additional $5.00/stop
